title: The innocent mistress a comedy, as it was acted by His Majesty's servants at the theatre in Little-Lincolns-Inn-Fields / written by Mrs. Mary Pix.
author: Pix, Mary, 1666-1720.
publisher: Printed by J. Orme, for R. Basset, and F. Cogan,
